name: Paracosm (Alpha Version)
description:
We are showing our alpha version of Paracosm.
Have fun testing and leave us some comments with feedback, so we can improve it.

Further Information about our game and us:

PARACOSM is an endless runner game with an end, a “finite runner” if you will.

Run through the dystopian city of PARACOSM and fight against supernatural obstacles on your way to the top of the tallest skyscraper.

PARACOSM features:

- The feeling of speed as you rush upwards into space

- Easy controls and infinite re-tries

- Minimalistic, but good-looking graphics

- A unique blend of hard-surface sci-fi and supernatural horror

CONTROLS:

- Use the left and right arrow keys or the “A” and “D” key to move your character to the left and right

CREDITS:

- Annika Heilmann (Game + Level Design)

- Bianca Rühr Levy (Art)

- Hakon Wind (Art, Code)

- Kai Heide (Art)

- Khira Niemeier (Code)

- Kristina Pelz (Project Management)
